# Nothing but Nix **Transform your GitHub Actions runner into a [Nix](https://zero-to-nix.com/concepts/nix/) ‚ùÑÔ∏è powerhouse by ruthlessly slashing pre-installed bloat.** GitHub Actions runners come with meager disk space for Nix - a mere ~20GB. *Nothing but Nix* **brutally purges** unnecessary software, giving you **65GB to 130GB** for your Nix store! üí™ ## Usage üîß Add this action **before** installing Nix in your workflow:

# Nothing but Nix **Transforme seu runner do GitHub Actions em uma pot√™ncia [Nix](https://zero-to-nix.com/concepts/nix/) ‚ùÑÔ∏è eliminando implacavelmente softwares pr√©-instalados desnecess√°rios.** Os runners do GitHub Actions v√™m com pouco espa√ßo em disco para o Nix ‚Äì apenas cerca de ~20GB. *Nothing but Nix* **remove brutalmente** softwares desnecess√°rios, fornecendo **65GB a 130GB** para sua Nix store! üí™ ## Uso üîß Adicione esta action **antes** de instalar o Nix em seu workflow:

RowTranslations.originContent: **Transform your GitHub Actions runner into a [Nix](https://zero-to-nix.com/concepts/nix/) ‚ùÑÔ∏è powerhouse by ruthlessly slashing pre-installed bloat.**
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **Transforme seu runner do GitHub Actions em uma pot√™ncia [Nix](https://zero-to-nix.com/concepts/nix/) ‚ùÑÔ∏è eliminando implacavelmente softwares pr√©-instalados desnecess√°rios.**

RowTranslations.originContent: GitHub Actions runners come with meager disk space for Nix - a mere ~20GB.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Os runners do GitHub Actions v√™m com pouco espa√ßo em disco para o Nix ‚Äì apenas cerca de ~20GB.

RowTranslations.originContent: *Nothing but Nix* **brutally purges** unnecessary software, giving you **65GB to 130GB** for your Nix store! üí™
RowTranslations.translatedContent: *Nothing but Nix* **remove brutalmente** softwares desnecess√°rios, fornecendo **65GB a 130GB** para sua Nix store! üí™

RowTranslations.originContent: Add this action **before** installing Nix in your workflow:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Adicione esta action **antes** de instalar o Nix em seu workflow:

Content:
```yaml
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      id-token: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main
      - name: Install Nix
        uses: DeterminateSystems/nix-installer-action@main
      - name: Run Nix
        run: |
          nix --version
          # Your Nix-powered steps here...
```
Translation:
```yaml
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      id-token: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main
      - name: Install Nix
        uses: DeterminateSystems/nix-installer-action@main
      - name: Run Nix
        run: |
          nix --version
          # Your Nix-powered steps here...
```

Content:
### Requirements Ô∏è‚úîÔ∏è

- Only supports official **Ubuntu** GitHub Actions runners
- Must run **before** Nix is installed

## The Problem: Making Room for Nix to Thrive üå±

Standard GitHub Actions runners are stuffed with *"bloatware"* you'll never use in a Nix workflow:

- üåç Web browsers. Lots of them. Gotta have 'em all!
- üê≥ Docker images consuming gigabytes of precious disk space
- üíª Unnecessary language runtimes (.NET, Ruby, PHP, Java...)
- üì¶ Package managers gathering digital dust
- üìö Documentation no one will ever read

This bloat leaves only ~20GB for your Nix store - barely enough for serious Nix builds! üòû

## The Solution: Nothing but Nix Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è

**Nothing but Nix** takes a scorched-earth approach to GitHub Actions runners and mercilessly reclaims disk space using a two-phase attack:

1. **Initial Slash:** Instantly creates a large `/nix` volume (~65GB) by claiming free space from `/mnt`
2. **Background Rampage:** While your workflow continues, we ruthlessly eliminate unnecessary software to expand your `/nix` volume up to ~130GB
   - Web browsers? Nope ‚õî
   - Docker images? Gone üóëÔ∏è
   - Language runtimes? Obliterated üí•
   - Package managers? Annihilated üí£
   - Documentation? Vaporized Ô∏èüëª

The file system purge is powered by `rmz` (from the [Fast Unix Commands (FUC)](https://github.com/SUPERCILEX/fuc) project) - a high-performance alternative to `rm` that makes space reclamation blazing fast! ‚ö°
   - Outperforms standard `rm` by an order of magnitude
   - Parallel-processes deletions for maximum efficiency
   - **Reclaims disk space in seconds rather than minutes!** Ô∏è‚è±Ô∏è

The end result? A GitHub Actions runner with **65GB to 130GB** of Nix-ready space! üòÅ

### Dynamic Volume Growth

Unlike other solutions, **Nothing but Nix** grows your `/nix` volume dynamically:

1. **Initial Volume Creation (1-10 seconds):** (*depending on Hatchet Protocol*)
   - Creates a loop device from free space on `/mnt`
   - Sets up a BTRFS filesystem in RAID0 configuration
   - Mounts with compression and performance tuning
   - Provides a 65GB `/nix` immediately, even before the purge begins

2. **Background Expansion (30-180 seconds):** (*depending on Hatchet Protocol*)
   - Executes purging operations
   - Monitors for newly freed space as bloat is eliminated
   - Dynamically adds an expansion disk to the `/nix` volume
   - Rebalances the filesystem to incorporate new space

The `/nix` volume automatically **grows during workflow execution** üé©ü™Ñ

### Choose Your Weapon: The Hatchet Protocol ü™ì

Control the level of annihilation üí• with the `hatchet-protocol` input:
Translation:
### Requisitos Ô∏è‚úîÔ∏è

- Suporta apenas runners oficiais do **Ubuntu** do GitHub Actions
- Deve ser executado **antes** que o Nix seja instalado

## O Problema: Abrindo Espa√ßo para o Nix Prosperar üå±

Os runners padr√£o do GitHub Actions est√£o cheios de *"bloatware"* que voc√™ nunca usar√° em um fluxo de trabalho Nix:

- üåç Navegadores web. Muitos deles. Tem que ter todos!
- üê≥ Imagens Docker consumindo gigabytes de espa√ßo precioso em disco
- üíª Runtimes de linguagens desnecess√°rios (.NET, Ruby, PHP, Java...)
- üì¶ Gerenciadores de pacotes juntando poeira digital
- üìö Documenta√ß√£o que ningu√©m jamais ler√°

Esse excesso deixa apenas ~20GB para seu reposit√≥rio Nix - mal o suficiente para builds Nix s√©rios! üòû

## A Solu√ß√£o: S√≥ Nix Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è

**S√≥ Nix** adota uma abordagem radical nos runners do GitHub Actions e recupera espa√ßo em disco de forma impiedosa usando um ataque em duas fases:

1. **Corte Inicial:** Cria instantaneamente um grande volume `/nix` (~65GB) reivindicando espa√ßo livre de `/mnt`
2. **Ataque em Segundo Plano:** Enquanto seu fluxo de trabalho continua, eliminamos implacavelmente softwares desnecess√°rios para expandir seu volume `/nix` para at√© ~130GB
   - Navegadores web? N√£o ‚õî
   - Imagens Docker? Fora üóëÔ∏è
   - Runtimes de linguagem? Obliterados üí•
   - Gerenciadores de pacotes? Aniquilados üí£
   - Documenta√ß√£o? Vaporizada Ô∏èüëª

A limpeza do sistema de arquivos √© feita pelo `rmz` (do projeto [Fast Unix Commands (FUC)](https://github.com/SUPERCILEX/fuc)) - uma alternativa de alto desempenho ao `rm` que torna a recupera√ß√£o de espa√ßo extremamente r√°pida! ‚ö°
   - Supera o `rm` padr√£o em uma ordem de magnitude
   - Processa dele√ß√µes em paralelo para m√°xima efici√™ncia
   - **Recupera espa√ßo em disco em segundos, n√£o minutos!** Ô∏è‚è±Ô∏è

O resultado final? Um runner do GitHub Actions com **65GB a 130GB** de espa√ßo pronto para Nix! üòÅ

### Crescimento Din√¢mico do Volume

Diferente de outras solu√ß√µes, o **S√≥ Nix** aumenta seu volume `/nix` de forma din√¢mica:

1. **Cria√ß√£o Inicial do Volume (1-10 segundos):** (*dependendo do Hatchet Protocol*)
   - Cria um dispositivo de loop a partir do espa√ßo livre em `/mnt`
   - Configura um sistema de arquivos BTRFS em RAID0
   - Monta com compress√£o e ajuste de desempenho
   - Fornece 65GB em `/nix` imediatamente, mesmo antes do in√≠cio da limpeza

2. **Expans√£o em Segundo Plano (30-180 segundos):** (*dependendo do Hatchet Protocol*)
   - Executa opera√ß√µes de limpeza
   - Monitora por espa√ßo rec√©m-liberado √† medida que o excesso √© eliminado
   - Adiciona dinamicamente um disco de expans√£o ao volume `/nix`
   - Rebalanceia o sistema de arquivos para incorporar o novo espa√ßo

O volume `/nix` **cresce automaticamente durante a execu√ß√£o do workflow** üé©ü™Ñ

### Escolha sua Arma: O Hatchet Protocol ü™ì

Controle o n√≠vel de aniquila√ß√£o üí• com a entrada `hatchet-protocol`:

Content:
```yaml
- uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main
  with:
    hatchet-protocol: 'cleave'  # Options: holster, carve, cleave (default), rampage
```
Translation:
```yaml
- uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main
  with:
    hatchet-protocol: 'cleave'  # Options: holster, carve, cleave (default), rampage
```

RowTranslations.originContent: hatchet-protocol: 'cleave'  # Options: holster, carve, cleave (default), rampage
RowTranslations.translatedContent: hatchet-protocol: 'cleave'  # Options: holster, carve, cleave (default), rampage

Content:
#### Protocol Comparison ‚öñÔ∏è

| Protocol | `/nix` | Description                                      | Purge apt  | Purge docker | Purge snap | Purged file systems     |
|----------|--------|--------------------------------------------------|------------|--------------|------------|-------------------------|
| Holster  | ~65GB  | Keep the hatchet sheathed, use space from `/mnt` | No         | No           | No         | None                    |
| Carve    | ~85GB  | Craft and combine free space from `/` and `/mnt` | No         | No           | No         | None                    |
| Cleave   | ~115GB | Make powerful, decisive cuts to large packages   | Minimal    | Yes          | Yes        | `/opt` and `/usr/local` |
| Rampage  | ~130GB | Relentless, brutal elimination of all bloat      | Aggressive | Yes          | Yes        | Muahahaha! üî•üåé         |

Choose wisely:
- **Holster** when you need the runner's tools to remain fully functional
- **Carve** to preserve functional runner tooling but claim all free space for Nix
- **Cleave** (*default*) for a good balance of space and functionality
- **Rampage** when you need maximum Nix space and don't care what breaks `#nix-is-life`

### Witness The Carnage ü©∏

By default, the purging process executes silently in the background while your workflow continues. But if you want to watch the slaughter in real-time:
Translation:
#### Compara√ß√£o de Protocolos ‚öñÔ∏è

| Protocolo | `/nix` | Descri√ß√£o                                         | Purge apt  | Purge docker | Purge snap | Sistemas de arquivos eliminados     |
|-----------|--------|---------------------------------------------------|------------|--------------|------------|-------------------------------------|
| Holster   | ~65GB  | Mantenha o machado embainhado, use espa√ßo do `/mnt` | N√£o        | N√£o          | N√£o        | Nenhum                              |
| Carve     | ~85GB  | Crie e combine espa√ßo livre de `/` e `/mnt`       | N√£o        | N√£o          | N√£o        | Nenhum                              |
| Cleave    | ~115GB | Fa√ßa cortes poderosos e decisivos em pacotes grandes | M√≠nimo     | Sim          | Sim        | `/opt` e `/usr/local`               |
| Rampage   | ~130GB | Elimina√ß√£o implac√°vel e brutal de todo o excesso  | Agressivo  | Sim          | Sim        | Muahahaha! üî•üåé                     |

Escolha com sabedoria:
- **Holster** quando voc√™ precisa que as ferramentas do runner permane√ßam totalmente funcionais
- **Carve** para preservar as ferramentas do runner funcionais mas usar todo o espa√ßo livre para o Nix
- **Cleave** (*padr√£o*) para um bom equil√≠brio entre espa√ßo e funcionalidade
- **Rampage** quando voc√™ precisa do m√°ximo de espa√ßo para Nix e n√£o se importa com o que quebrar `#nix-is-life`

### Testemunhe a Carnificina ü©∏

Por padr√£o, o processo de limpeza √© executado silenciosamente em segundo plano enquanto seu fluxo de trabalho continua. Mas se quiser assistir ao massacre em tempo real:

Content:
### Customize Safe Havens üõ°Ô∏è

Control how much space to spare from the Nix store land grab with custom safe haven sizes:
Translation:
### Personalize Ref√∫gios Seguros üõ°Ô∏è

Controle quanto espa√ßo reservar do avan√ßo do Nix store com tamanhos personalizados de ref√∫gio seguro:

RowTranslations.originContent: Control how much space to spare from the Nix store land grab with custom safe haven sizes:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Controle quanto espa√ßo reservar do avan√ßo do Nix store com tamanhos personalizados de ref√∫gio seguro:

Content:
```yaml
- uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main

    mnt-safe-haven: '2048'    # Reserve 2GB on the /mnt filesystem
```

Content:
These safe havens define how much space (in MB) will be mercifully spared during space reclamation:
- Default `root-safe-haven` is 2048MB (2GB)
- Default `mnt-safe-haven` is 1024MB (1GB)

Increase these values if you need more breathing room on your filesystems, or decrease them to show no mercy! üòà

### Grant User Ownership of /nix (Nix Permission Edict) üßë‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è

Some Nix installers or configurations expect the `/nix` directory to be writable by the current user. By default, `/nix` is owned by root. If you need user ownership (e.g., for certain Nix installer scripts that don't use `sudo` for all operations within `/nix`), you can enable the `nix-permission-edict`:

- O `root-safe-haven` padr√£o √© 2048MB (2GB)
- O `mnt-safe-haven` padr√£o √© 1024MB (1GB)

Aumente esses valores se precisar de mais espa√ßo livre em seus sistemas de arquivos ou diminua-os para n√£o mostrar miseric√≥rdia! üòà

### Conceder Propriedade de Usu√°rio ao /nix (√âdito de Permiss√£o do Nix) üßë‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è

Se voc√™ precisar de propriedade de usu√°rio (por exemplo, para certos scripts de instala√ß√£o do Nix que n√£o usam `sudo` para todas as opera√ß√µes dentro de `/nix`), voc√™ pode ativar o `nix-permission-edict`:

If you need user ownership (e.g., for certain Nix installer scripts that don't use `sudo` for all operations within `/nix`), you can enable the `nix-permission-edict`:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Alguns instaladores ou configura√ß√µes do Nix esperam que o diret√≥rio `/nix` seja grav√°vel pelo usu√°rio atual. Por padr√£o, o `/nix` pertence ao root. Se voc√™ precisar de propriedade de usu√°rio (por exemplo, para certos scripts de instala√ß√£o do Nix que n√£o usam `sudo` para todas as opera√ß√µes dentro de `/nix`), voc√™ pode ativar o `nix-permission-edict`:

Translation:
```yaml
- uses: wimpysworld/nothing-but-nix@main
  with:
    nix-permission-edict: true  # Default: false
```

Content:
When `nix-permission-edict` is set to `true`, the action will run `sudo chown -R "$(id --user)":"$(id --group)" /nix` after mounting `/nix`.

Now go and build something amazing with all that glorious Nix store space! ‚ùÑÔ∏è
